title: Malphites E should taunt people
body:
{{champion:3}} is still useful after his ult.

We need to help {{champion:54}} too.

replies.body: So instead of educating a person on why this would be a bad idea, "being a higher ranked player", you're going to instead belittle his opinions and basically call him stupid? Honestly, that's you, TheLastShadow45 being a {{item:1038}} {{item:1058}}  for no real reason. You don't belittle someone that doesn't know, you teach them so they do know.
Dude, look at this guys post history. It's full of stupid shit.
Dunno why you gotta hate someone for making a post.

As if malphite needs this.
Gr8 B8 M8
It reduces attack speed as far as I know
